name: カニマン VS メカモンキー
name_original: カニマン VS メカモンキー
description:
カニマン VS メカモンキー(Werecrab VS Mechanical monkey)
Unforgivable! This time's Monkey-Crab Battle was horrible, wasn't it?! The Kaniman(Werecrab) clan was thrown down into the fiery pits of the Nabe by the Mechanical monkey squad. Will Kaniman, bereft of his clan, throw or be thrown down? The battle for revenge starts now!

Features
  • Exilarating action with Kaniman vs. The Mechanical monkey Squad. Who will throw down and who will be thrown?
  • A total of 40 waves, with huge bosses and several gimmick stages
  • Diverse Kaniman action, Move、Dash、Jump、Attack、Aerial attack
  • Bubble attack that stops movement, far-reaching Chestnut bom, one hit KO Special summon attack, and more
  • Different team formations allow for different variation combos
  • Heroically defeat the accursed Mechanical monkey squad with consecutive combos!
